title: How old do you have to be for ESports?

replies.body:
Hey! From what I recall, LCS members have to be 17 and above (although, someone feel free to correct me if I'm wrong ^^')

However! 

There are some really cool collegiate and high school e-sport programs popping up in the US (Kansas Wesleyan College just hired a full time esports coach, and a lot of other colleges, such as SCAD, GA Tech, and Texas A+M are propping up official collegiate teams too! )

The infrastructure is growing, and it's p cool. Maybe if you're too young for the LCS atm, you could look into Collegiate or High School options. Hell, you could even form a team/club yourself in your current institution and we'll send you some goodies to help it along :D

But 17 for LCS... Yeah... TLDR or something.
